summary: Under the Private Debt Collection Program, the IRS contracts with private collection agencies to collect certain taxes that haven't been paid. Most of the individual and business taxpayers that IRS assigns to this program owe $5k or less. The IRS should evaluate potential equity disparities in this program, such as unintended and unwarranted differences in collection referrals by race, sex, or location. However, the IRS...
title: Private Debt Collection Program: IRS Could Improve Results and Better Promote Equitable Outcomes for Taxpayers
